title: First-principles study of the effect of oxygen vacancy and iridium doping on formaldehyde adsorption on the La2O3(001) surface
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21398-21410
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01948B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Youhui Xu, Xiaoying Cao, Xiuwu Chen, Fanting Kong, Hongbo Liang, Hengjiao Gao, Hongxia Cao, Jieyu Li
Formaldehyde adsorption on intrinsic La2O3 surface, four-fold coordinated oxygen vacancy (VO4c), six-fold coordinated oxygen vacancy (VO6c), and iridium-doped La2O3(001) surface was studied by the first-principles method.
